programme.desc: Un programa de entretenimiento matutino que te alegran las mañanas, con la conducción estelar de la pareja Fernando del Solar e Ingrid Coronado, el programa cuenta con secciones tales cómo:- Ingrid habla con los peques- Cocina de Yolo- Baila con Alegría- Los especialistas- Noli y sus tips- El autobús de Danilo- Las rapiditas de Venga la Alegría- La LiliparodiaEl programa empieza con un tema bailable donde los presentadores y sus chicas bailarinas te ayudan a que te animes y llegue la alegría.Durante todo el programa se dan pistas sobre una palabra o frase que el televidente puede concursar para ganarse un premio.

programme.title: That Dirty Black Bag
programme.sub-title: Chapter One: A Head Weighs Less Than a Body
programme.desc: Far off in the West, bounty hunter Red Bill searches for the man who slew his mother; in nearby Greenvale, where it hasn't rained for years, local farmer Steve finds gold beneath his land; Sheriff McCoy comes upon a small fortune.

programme.title: That Dirty Black Bag
programme.desc: After Red Bill is captured, old memories come back to haunt him; McCoy comes upon Butler's farm; Steve and Eve's relationship woes intensify.

programme.title: That Dirty Black Bag
programme.desc: Red Bill travels the barren wastes with McCoy and Kurt; in Greenvale, Eve's struggle to maintain her business is threatened; Thompson's claim to Steve's land is taken up a notch.

programme.title: That Dirty Black Bag
programme.desc: Fifteen years earlier, Red Bill learns about being a man from a rugged Civil War veteran, Anderson; McCoy and his vile older brother, Bronson, must resort to increasingly dark means as they struggle to survive the desert.

programme.title: That Dirty Black Bag
programme.desc: Red Bill, McCoy and Kurt enter the mines, where trouble ensues; Eve faces dire consequences for her actions; a modern-day Bronson runs for governor.

programme.title: That Dirty Black Bag
programme.desc: Rain comes to Greenvale, bringing with it great struggle; Bronson's men encounter McCoy and Red Bill; unexpected reunions abound.

programme.title: That Dirty Black Bag
programme.desc: In the wake of the shoot-offs with Bronson's men, Red Bill and McCoy must come together for a common goal; Thompson's pressure on Steve reaches a boiling point.

programme.title: That Dirty Black Bag
programme.desc: Red Bill and McCoy's quest for Bronson comes to a breaking point, as impossible decisions and realizations are made; Bronson takes a new step toward power; Steve faces Thompson in a final standoff.

programme.title: That Dirty Black Bag
programme.sub-title: Chapter One: A Head Weighs Less Than a Body
programme.desc: Far off in the West, bounty hunter Red Bill searches for the man who slew his mother; in nearby Greenvale, where it hasn't rained for years, local farmer Steve finds gold beneath his land; Sheriff McCoy comes upon a small fortune.

programme.title: That Dirty Black Bag
programme.desc: After Red Bill is captured, old memories come back to haunt him; McCoy comes upon Butler's farm; Steve and Eve's relationship woes intensify.

programme.title: That Dirty Black Bag
programme.desc: Red Bill travels the barren wastes with McCoy and Kurt; in Greenvale, Eve's struggle to maintain her business is threatened; Thompson's claim to Steve's land is taken up a notch.

programme.title: That Dirty Black Bag
programme.desc: Fifteen years earlier, Red Bill learns about being a man from a rugged Civil War veteran, Anderson; McCoy and his vile older brother, Bronson, must resort to increasingly dark means as they struggle to survive the desert.

programme.title: The Cow
programme.desc: Upon arriving at a remote cabin for a getaway, a woman and her boyfriend discover another couple already staying there. They decide to share the rental for the night, but the boyfriend's disappearance sparks a race for answers.

programme.title: Lakota Nation vs. United States
programme.desc: The Lakota people fight to reclaim their sacred land and protect it from government and corporate interests.

programme.title: Bad Axe
programme.desc: A real-time portrait of 2020 unfolds as an Asian American family in rural Michigan fights to keep its restaurant and American dream alive.

programme.title: Hold Your Fire
programme.desc: In 1973, the NYPD corners four young African Americans who planned to steal guns for the purpose of self-defense. Visionary police psychologist Harvey Schlossberg convinces his superiors to allow him to negotiate and save the 12 hostages.

programme.title: Vesper
programme.desc: Struggling to survive with her father after the collapse of Earth's ecosystem, 13-year-old Vesper must use her wits, strength and bio-hacking abilities to fight for the future.

programme.title: Section 8
programme.desc: A good kid in an awful situation and two cops near the bust of their careers cross paths when the kid falls witness to his father's death.

programme.title: God's Time
programme.desc: Two best friends race against time to stop the woman they're both in love with from committing murder.

programme.title: Force of Nature: The Dry 2
programme.desc: Five women head out on a remote hiking retreat but only four return, each telling a different story. Detective Aaron Falk must find out what really happened before time runs out.

programme.title: Tornado
programme.desc: When her father's puppet samurai show gets ambushed by a notorious gang, Tornado vows to seek vengeance and forge her own destiny by stealing their ill-gotten gold.

programme.title: Apex
programme.desc: Imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, ex-cop Thomas Malone gets a chance to win his freedom if he can survive a twisted game. Six goons pay for the thrill of hunting Malone for sport on a remote island, but once he arrives, all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Rubikon
programme.desc: Following a catastrophe on Earth, the planet is covered in a toxic fog. A group of astronauts must decide whether to risk their lives searching for survivors or stay safe in space.

programme.title: Biosphere
programme.desc: In the not-too-distant future, the last two men on Earth must adapt and evolve to save humanity.

programme.title: Formuła 1: Grand Prix Wielkiej Brytanii
programme.desc: Dwunasta runda tegorocznego cyklu będzie miała szczególne znaczenia dla Lewisa Hamiltona. Po przenosinach do Ferrari wyniki Brytyjczyka pozostawiają wiele do życzenia, lecz zmagania na legendarnym torze Silverstone mogą się okazać dla niego momentem zwrotnym sezonu. Siedmiokrotny mistrz świata wygrał tu rekordowe dziewięć wyścigów, ostatni z nich w 2024 roku. Było to wówczas jego pierwsze zwycięstwo od ponad 900 dni! Od ponownego przebudzenia Hamiltona bardziej prawdopodobny wydaje się jednak triumf innego z Brytyjczyków - George'a Russella, jego byłego partnera z Mercedesa, lub Landa Norrisa z bardzo szybkiego w obecnej kampanii McLarena. Na Silverstone błysnąć postara się też Oscar Piastri, który mimo delikatnego potknięcia w Grand Prix Kanady pozostał liderem klasyfikacji generalnej kierowców.
